title: Cheap Eats
name: Cheap Eats
description:
A Map by Davescheapeats

Where to find the Best Cheap Eats in America. From www.DavesCheapEats.com

properties.name: Adriana's
properties.description: Posted by Davescheapeats5101 Shaw Ave, St Louis, MO 63110, USAGreat lunch spot on the hill with huge sandwiches with even more flavor

properties.name: Agua Brava Nayarit
properties.description: Posted by Davescheapeats I rickity Lobster shack on the edge of the Pacific where the big waves shake this shack, but for 0 for enough lobster to fill 6 people plus sides and drinks, you can\'t go wrong! As long as you can find it!

properties.name: Alki Crab and Fish Co
properties.description: Posted by Davescheapeats 1660 Harbor Ave. S.W. Seattle, WA 98126Cheap eats on the water in the back of a tackle shop.

properties.name: Bea's Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Davescheapeats 4500 Dodds Ave., Chattanooga, TN, 37407The place for a Lazy Susan dining experience. If you don\'t know what it is, imagine an all you can eat buffet that spins around your table so you don\'t have to get up!

properties.name: City Cafe Diner
properties.description: Posted by Davescheapeats   901 Carter St, Chattanooga, TN 37402A little bit of cheap NYC diner in the mid south.

properties.name: Dane County Farmer's Market
properties.description: Posted by Davescheapeats   Madison, WILitterally farm fresh food at dirt cheap prices

properties.name: Dotties True Blue Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Davescheapeats  522 Jones Street, San Francisco, CAAt the edge of the edgie Tenderloin is a great cheap eats breakfast restaurant. You might have to wait on the street for over an hour. But that\'s just part of the experience (don\'t stare too long at the Drag Queens, it\'s impolite!).

properties.name: El Ok Corral
properties.description: Posted by Davescheapeats 14841 Lebanon RdThe best Mexican food at the best prices in Eastern Metro Nashville.

properties.name: Hodak's
properties.description: Posted by Davescheapeats 2100 Gravois Ave, St Louis, 63104Chicken and more, fried food that\'s almost free, a South City institution that always fills you up with cheap eats!

properties.name: Low's International Foods
properties.description: Posted by Davescheapeats 222 Kilauea Ave., Hilo, HI, 96720Low class fusion food done right.

properties.name: Mildred’s Catfish and Buffet
properties.description: Posted by Davescheapeats 9565 Highway 53, Ardmore, ALGreat southern cooking buffet with some of the best catfish in Alabama

properties.name: Naan -N- Curry
properties.description: Posted by Davescheapeats 336 OFarrell St, San Francisco, CAGreat Indian at unbelievable cheap prices just of Union Square in the theater district of San Francisco.

properties.name: Ono Hawaiian Foods
properties.description: Posted by Davescheapeats 726 Kapahulu Ave, Honolulu, HIWho needs an overpriced Hawaiian Luau when Ono\'s does it all for so much less!

properties.name: Parker's
properties.description: Posted by Davescheapeats 2514 Highway 301 S., Wilson NC,BBQ institution with insanely cheap prices and large servings.

properties.name: Pizzeria Della Piazza
properties.description: Posted by Davescheapeats 5100 Daggett Ave, Saint Louis, MO 63110 The best deep dish pizza in St. Louis!

properties.name: Sadie's
properties.description: Posted by Davescheapeats 6230 4th NW, Albuquerque, NM 87107Big servings and little prices make this a great cheap eats destination.

properties.name: San Juan Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Davescheapeats 1005 Valley Ridge Road, Covington, VAThe best Mexican seafood at amazingly cheap prices in the Blue Ridge Mountains.

properties.name: Talayna’s
properties.description: Posted by Davescheapeats 310 DeBaliviere, St. Louis, MO 63112The best thin crust, plus great salads all for cheap prices!

properties.name: The Gumbo Shop
properties.description: Posted by Davescheapeats  9501Manchester Rd., Rock Hill, MOCajun done right and cheap in Metro St. Louis.

properties.name: Tortillas To Go
properties.description: Posted by Davescheapeats 804 N White Sands Blvd, Alamogordo, NMGreat cheap eats New Mexican food (not southwest, not mexican, but New Mexican) that\'s all in the fresh sauce.

properties.name: jj twigs
properties.description: Posted by Davescheapeats 2964 Dougherty Ferry, St. Louis, MOGreat local double crust pizza that will make you take a double take when you see the prices.
